alert.note: Alert for Irion (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 23 at 10:36PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Tom Green and eastern Irion Counties through 1115 PM CDT... At 1034 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong outflow winds from a thunderstorm. The outflow boundary is over Lake Nasworthy, moving south at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... San Angelo, Mertzon, Christoval, Wall, San Angelo State Park, Twin Buttes Reservoir, Sherwood, Goodfellow Air Force Base, Veribest, Knickerbocker, O.c. Fisher Reservoir, Arden, Lake Nasworthy, Tankersley and Us-67 Near The Irion-Tom Green County Line. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 200 AM CDT for west central Texas.
